result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Devine E. Mendoza

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Marisa. 
Case Called: 9:26 am 
INCLUDES 21CF867, 21CT169, 21CT179, 21CT349, & 22CF616. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Def appears in person with Atty Julianne Lennon. 
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. 
State moves to: 
In 21CF867: Ct. 2>>D&RI. 
In 21CT169: Ct. 1>>D&RI. 
In 21CT179: Ct. 1>>D&RI. 
In 21CT349: Ct. 1>>D&RI. 
In 22CF616: Cts. 1 - 3>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: 
In 21CF867: Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine/Repeater)>>NO CONTEST. 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 

COURT ORDERS: SWH for 3 years probation - CONDITIONS: assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by the dept; absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances/alcohol except prescribed medications taken as prescribed; good faith effort at fulltime employment/school/combination of the 2 of at least 30 hours per week or if not, perform 9 hours CS per week; 45 days jail to start at agent's discretion with EMP if def qualifies; CC including DNA surcharge (sample already on file). 

COURT has no objection to transfer of probation/conditional jail to def's County of residence (Wood County). 
COURT finds the def entitled to 7 days jail credit. 
Adj: 9:36 am
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief
Status conference on August 17, 2022 at 09:10 am.
Pre-trial conference on July 14, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Status conference on July 7, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Pre-trial conference on July 14, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Preliminary Hearing on September 6, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license.   Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (4) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.
